rows.label: tev000493_MSG0001
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]. Impeccable timing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0002
rows.name: Would you be so kind as to drag me out of here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0011
rows.name: Drag H.B. away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0021
rows.name: Flatly refuse H.B.'s request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0008
rows.name: Your quick thinking never ceases to impress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0009
rows.name:
Once again, I find myself being overzealously courted
by a number of eager ladies. You'd think I'd be used
to it by now, but I am most certainly not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0010
rows.name:
Had I been satisfied living the life of your everyday
Joe Pathfinder, I suppose I could have avoided this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0011
rows.name:
But alas, this is the price one must pay to be the
elite-est of the elite.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0012
rows.name:
Ah, but I'm sure I'm not telling you anything you don't
already know! As a fellow elite, you must struggle with
this sort of thing yourself, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0013
rows.name:
I imagine the good [ST:gender p1=ladies p2=gentlemen ] of New LA must hound
you relentlessly and without pause![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0110
rows.name: Affirm[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0111
rows.name: Admit your popularity with the opposite sex.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0120
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0121
rows.name: Say that doesn't really happen to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0019
rows.name: Ah, I figured as much. You sly dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0020
rows.name:
And as such, you are the rare soul who can empathize
with my pain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0022
rows.name: I am dreadfully sorry to hear that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0023
rows.name:
What could the people of NLA possibly be thinking?
After all, there are other perfectly desirable people here
besides myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0025
rows.name:
Yes, well, I fear this is no time for a leisurely
discussion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0026
rows.name:
You must drag me out of here at once. Please feel free
to use as much force as you're comfortable with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0027
rows.name:
Then it will be you whom the ladies blame for my
abrupt departure, and not I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0028
rows.name:
In this way, we can spare them a little bit of
heartbreak, which is but the classy thing to do.
I'll see that I make it up to you later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0032
rows.name: I...see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0033
rows.name:
If I may be so bold, sometimes I question your
judgment as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0034
rows.name:
These ladies believe that I am humanity's only hope,
and will stop at nothing to curry my favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0035
rows.name:
If I were to reject their sad, desperate advances,
my reputation would be in tatters. They seek only the
solace of a hero, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0036
rows.name:
As a likely candidate to lead BLADE in the near future,
I cannot allow unfavorable rumors about me to circulate
amongst the rabble. Surely you understand this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0210
rows.name: Reconsider[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0211
rows.name: Agree to drag H.B. away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_JNK0220
rows.name: Inform[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_SEL0221
rows.name: Say the ladies may like his personality, not his station.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0042
rows.name: You have made the right decision, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0043
rows.name: Now it is you the ladies will resent, and not I.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0044
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0045
rows.name:
Yes, well. Never mind the details. Just take me to your
next mission or...wherever else you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0048
rows.name: I had not considered that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0049
rows.name:
You're saying they might actually have true feelings for
me? That they might even be unaware that I am the
elite-est of all elites?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0050
rows.name: ...Then that makes them all the more dangerous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0051
rows.name:
I have no intention of allowing a female companion to
distract me from my duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0052
rows.name:
And thus, like poor Phaedra chasing after Hippolytus,
I fear their love can never be reciprocated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0053
rows.name:
Plus, who knows how they might misinterpret the bond
that you and I share, hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000493_MSG0054
rows.name:
No, it will not do. I must return to the administrative
district and begin drafting countermeasures immediately.[ST:wait ]
